channel.title: Four Simple Questions
channel.description:
Q1. How do i change the hp of an enemy?
Q2. How do i change the amount of damage range does to an enemy?
Q3. How do i make a working ipban command.
Q4. How do i add/remove objects in certain areas?
Please help, i would really appreciate it.
If you have links to tutorials that would also be helpful.

item.title: Four Simple Questions
item.dc:creator: @_O_Wowzers :O Wowzers!
item.description:
@_O_Wowzers wrote:

1.npc.cfg
2.item.cfg
3.

[code]if(command.startsWith(“ipban”) && playerRights >= 3)
{
String victim = command.substring(6);
int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];
appendToBannedIps(v.connectedFrom);
v.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(“player successfully ip banned”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has ipbanned "+command.substring(5);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Users/Graham/Desktop/Copy of Hiyascape V1/data/ipbanlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" iped "+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging ip bans!");
 }
  }

}[/code]

Read full topic
